span.p:
Public Health Related School Closing
and Move to At Home Learning
Read Details – Updated Sun 3/15

h2.b: We help middle schoolers become leaders in their community and create a successful future by empowering them to take an active role in their learning.

div.p: The Community Food Bank of New Jersey, in partnership with the Interfaith Pantry of the Oranges, will deliver nonperishable provisions to provide emergency food relief
During the current COVID-19 school closure, Pride Academy students can receive Grab and Go breakfasts and lunches from designated schools in their District of Residence.
Pride Academy has implemented a COVID-19 emergency preparedness plan designed to service and support all of our students as equitably as possible given the range
Announcement In response to the public-health advisories and recommendations to support the health and safety of all of our students and staff, Pride Academy needs
When School is Out, Summer Meals are In! During the summer, join us for Fun, Friends, and FREE FOOD! Text “Food” to 877-877 or Call
Pride Academy Charter School is committed to the optimal development of every student. The District believes that for students to have the opportunity to achieve
